### Software & Code

All software I have developed, including the source code for projects like **[OpenImpala](https://github.com/kramergroup/openImpala)**, is released under a permissive open-source license, typically the **BSD 3-Clause License**.

This allows for broad reuse with minimal restrictions. Please refer to the `LICENSE` file in the specific GitHub repository for the full terms.

### Academic Publications

My peer-reviewed publications are subject to the copyright and licensing terms of their respective journals and publishers. The license for this website **does not apply** to my published articles.

Please refer to the article's official page via its DOI link for specific licensing and reuse information. Many of my articles are published **Open Access**, often under a Creative Commons license designated by the publisher.
